description:
The at-home answer to wrinkle-filling injections†. Start rebuilding collagen in just 48 hours.
BEFORE
Skin's 4 structural components weaken and decrease, causing new lines to form and wrinkles to deepen.

is designed to help reduce the length, depth and number of visible wrinkles.

title: Jergens Original Scent Moisturizer, Cherry-Almond, 10 Ounce
description: Jergens Original Scent Moisturizer transports you back in time as it transforms dry skin into captivatingly soft skin. Leaves skin embraceable silky and subtly fragranced. Jergens Moisturizer with the classic Cherry-Almond scent. Comforts and Nourishes.

title: The Body Shop Shower Gel, Satsuma, 8.4 Fluid Ounce
description: Use our satsuma shower gel to wake up with this invigorating, cleansing gel that leaves your skin clean and soft with a fresh citrus scent. The essential oil from the satsuma peel moisturizes the skin and provides the delicious citrus scent. Community trade organic soy oil is rich in essential fatty acids that repair skin's moisture barrier so skin is smooth and supple. Our community trade organic soy oil is produced in brazil, by the capanema farmers who practice sustainable farming methods without the use of chemicals. They are helping to preserve nature, as well as their traditional way of life. The body shop uses about 150 tons of soy oil a year, none of which, we can happily say, contributes to the destruction of the amazon rainforest.

title: Olay Age Defying Anti-Wrinkle Eye Cream 0.5 Oz
description: The Olay Age Defying Anti-Wrinkle Eye Cream, with Vitamin B3, Pro-Retinol and Beta-Hydroxy, reduces the appearance of wrinkles instantly and works over time to reduce the look of fine lines around the delicate eye area where signs of aging are most likely to appear - leaving skin noticeably soft and smooth.

title: L'Oreal Paris RevitaLift Triple Power Deep-Acting Moisturizer, 1.7 Fluid Ounce
L'Oreal Paris Collagen Moisture Filler Day/Night Cream, 1.7 Fluid Ounce
description: A dose of intense hydration and natural Collagen in Collagen Filler Moisture Day Lotion and Day/Night Cream is essential for younger-looking skin. Rich moisture instantly restores skin’s cushion and bounce. Over time, the powerful natural Collagen helps fill in lines and wrinkles, leaving your skin smooth and plump.  In just 4 weeks, 78% of women reported seeing their wrinkles filled in.  Use it for a complete collagen-infused skincare regimen.
